```{r}
review_times <- pooled_data[seq(1, length(pooled_data), by = 2)]
censorship <- pooled_data[seq(2, length(pooled_data), by = 2)]

KME <- survfit(Surv(review_times, censorship) ~ 1)

plot(KME, conf.int = T, xlab = "Days", ylab = "Survival Prob")

summary(KME, times = c(150))
```
